channel.title: [317] Changing client theme! [317]
channel.description:
[b]Step 1 :[/b] Go to GUI.java and search for [code]UIManager.setLookAndFeel[/code]
After that you should see a code, such as [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel[/code]
You can change it to Blue,Black,Green,White,Grey
------------------------------------------------------------------------- To change it to Blue replace the [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel[/code]
With [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceBusinessBlueSteelLookAndFeel[/code] -------------------------------------------------------------------------
To change it to Black replace the [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel[/code]
With [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceBusinessBlackSteelLookAndFeel[/code]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
To change it to Green replace the [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel[/code]
With [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceEmeraldDuskLookAndFeel[/code]
------------------------------------------------------------------------- To change it to White replace the [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel[/code]
With [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceCremeLookAndFeel[/code]
------------------------------------------------------------------------- To change it to Grey replace the [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel[/code]
With [code]org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMistAquaLookAndFeel[/code]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hope this helped!
- Bashar

item.title: [317] Changing client theme! [317]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Wow, you don’t have a very high list of this do you? There are like 30 themes inside of that Theme.jar file. Possibly more, I just cba to count.

All in all, this will help some who don’t know how to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Changing client theme! [317]
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

Step 1 : Go to GUI.java and search for

UIManager.setLookAndFeel

After that you should see a code, such as

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel

You can change it to Blue,Black,Green,White,Grey

To change it to Blue replace the

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel

With

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceBusinessBlueSteelLookAndFeel

To change it to Black replace the

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel

With

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceBusinessBlackSteelLookAndFeel

To change it to Green replace the

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel

With

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceEmeraldDuskLookAndFeel

To change it to White replace the

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel

With

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceCremeLookAndFeel

To change it to Grey replace the

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel

With

org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMistAquaLookAndFeel

Hope this helped!

  • Bashar
